accountId.description: Sprinklr internal reference ID for this account.

accountType.description: The name of the social platform this account is on.

accountUserId.description: External platform-specific reference ID for this account.

isActive.description: Indicates whether this account is active.

screenName.description: Handle of this account on the social platform.

profileImgUrl.description: URL of this account's profile picture.

ownerUserId.description: Internal reference ID for the Sprinklr user that authenticated this account.

snType.description: The name of the social platform associated with the handle.
